result.title: FLEXCoop OSB Prototype - Final Version
result.description: The deliverable will provide the final prototype of the Real time Monitoring Sensor/ Actuator Node (FLEXCoop Open Smart Box - OSB) that will be installed in the pilot consumers and enable the realization of the FLEXCoop concept for human-centric demand response deployment, following test results and feedback obtained during the first months of pilot roll out phase. The deliverable is an outcome of the Task 4.1.

result.title: Initial assessment of the RES innovations and GPPs on SMEs financial constraints
result.description:
Description: Based on data collected in WP2 this deliverable provides a descriptive, univariate assessment on how RES innovations and GPPs affect SMEs financial constraints and help local governments implementing their needs for RES innovations.
Indicator for success: Feedback from XPRESS partners and relevant stakeholders on the statistical analysis of the impact of RES innovations and GPPs on SMEs access to finance.
